title: Understanding the Voluntary Carbon Market | BCG - BCG
summary: Demand for voluntary carbon emissions credits is growing in spite of a sluggish economy and ongoing budget pressures. Notably, the focus of credit trading is shifting from reducing emissions through avoidance credits to removing them altogether through removal credits. Although removal credits are expensive, they are gaining popularity due to their verifiability and perceived quality.

title: Roechling Industrial Gastonia Makes Investment Toward Becoming Carbon Neutral - PR Newswire
summary: Roechling Industrial Gastonia, an industrial product manufacturer, has partnered with Gas South to reduce its environmental impact and achieve carbon neutrality by 2030. Roechling will use FlexRNG, a new energy option from Gas South, to offset its natural gas consumption and invest in renewable energy projects. This move is part of Roechling's holistic decarbonization strategy.

green_product: TRUE, because FlexRNG is a multifaceted offering that includes verifying, tracking and retiring renewable thermal credits and carbon offset credits in the company's name.
